skills.name: CARNAGE
desc: • Deals 3 hits of physical damage to a single target.
• 45% Chance to inflict a Random Negative Effect on each hit.

skills.name: FOUL PLAY
desc: • Deals 3 hits of physical damage to all enemies.
• 25% Chance to Remove One Beneficial Effect per hit.

skills.name: RIOT
desc: At the start of your turn, Cleanse yourself, heal all allies for every negative effect currently on you, and have a 35% Chance to Cleanse negative effects from up to 2 allies.
